sentences: Elas unes toimuvat läbi nii, nagu oleks see tõeliselt aset leidnud.
Tallinna kaunis panoraam avaneb tõeliselt ainult mere poolt vaadates.
context: The Estonian word 'tõeliselt' is an adverb that means really, actually, truly, or very/extremely. It has three main uses: 1) to indicate something is real/reality-based (not in appearance), as in describing events that actually happened; 2) to emphasize the full extent of something when viewing from a particular perspective; and 3) as an intensifier to strongly emphasize qualities, actions, or states. It comes from the adjective 'tõeline' meaning real/true with the adverbial suffix '-lt'. The comparative form is 'tõelisemalt'.
